document_data.caption: A map showing Orbedal in eastern Halruaa.
document_data.name: Orbedal
document_data.mainbody: '''Orbedal''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Orbedal was located in eastern Halruaa. The town lay in the western foothills of the [[Muaraghal Mountains]] along the southern shore of an unnamed tributary of [[Lake Maeru]].
